unnormalised: Arre yaar, lost my PAN card *again*! Last time it was with the chaiwala, this time I suspect my auto-rickshaw driver took it for the KYC. Now trying to remember my IFSC code for SBI, something like SBIN0001234 or is it SBIN000ABCD? Seriously considering getting a tattoo of my A/C no. before I forget that too! Maybe I should just stick to cash... oh wait, I forgot my UPI pin again. Facepalm!
normalised: Oh no, lost my P-A-N card again! Last time it was with the chaiwala, this time I suspect my auto-rickshaw driver took it for the K-Y-C. Now trying to remember my I-F-S-C code for S-B-I, something like S-B-I-N zero zero zero one two three four or is it S-B-I-N zero zero zero A-B-C-D? Seriously considering getting a tattoo of my A slash C no. before I forget that too! Maybe I should just stick to cash... oh wait, I forgot my U-P-I pin again. Facepalm!
